# ccRCC scRNA-seq analysis
## Enviroment setups
### Recommending memory
It is recommended to have memory>=30G to run scripts in this directory
### Required libraries
- SeuratV4
- future
- harmony
- Azimuth
## Data prepare
Please use [this link](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1CEdUnspMfthex0XSxemxCy1j5TWkWxCE/view?usp=sharing) to download the "raw_data.rds"
